rehabilitation.title: Rehabilitation
rehabilitation.description: Modern Israeli rehabilitation techniques for restoring and maintaining mobility and work capacity

professional.title: Professional Development
professional.description: Educational and professional development section in rehabilitation, physiotherapy and therapeutic-restorative massage - this is a collaboration with Israeli specialists and training centers, such as the College of Medical Massage, founded and led by Dr. Aaron Yacobi.

marketplace.description: We are developing the MARKETPLACE direction. Our partners in this direction can be rehabilitation centers, clinics, sanatoriums, sports clubs, massage ...
